snippet: Berkshire Hathaway has purchased nearly 1.7 million more shares of Phillips 66 to give it ownership of almost 14 percent of the oil refiner.
abstract: Berkshire Hathaway says it now owns almost 14 percent of Phillips 66 following purchase that increased conglomerate's shares of oil company to 73.9 million; shares are worth roughly $5.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway has purchased nearly 1.7 million more shares of Phillips 66 to give it ownership of almost 14 percent of the oil refiner.

headline.print_headline: Berkshire Hathaway Increases Stake in Oil Refiner Phillips 66
